description: Sets the data streaming configuration for an AppInstance. For more information, see Streaming messaging data in the Amazon Chime SDK Developer Guide.

parameters.name: AppInstanceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the streaming configuration.

parameters.name: StreamingConfigurations
parameters.description: The streaming configurations. (dict) --- The configuration for connecting a messaging stream to Amazon Kinesis. The data type of the configuration. The ARN of the resource in the configuration.

nested_params.name: DataType
nested_params.description: The data type of the configuration.

nested_params.name: ResourceArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the resource in the configuration.

nested_items.name: DataType
nested_items.description: The data type of the configuration.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the resource in the configuration.
